title: Figure 4: Internet activities, 2007 and 2012

data: Finding information about goods and services
Reading or downloading online news newspapers or news magazines
Using services related to travel or travel accommodation
Playing or downloading games images films or music
Listening to web radio or watching web television
Telephoning or making video calls over the Internet
Selling goods or services  e.g. eBay

categories: Finding information about goods and services
Reading or downloading online news, newspapers or news magazines
Using services related to travel or travel accommodation
Playing or downloading games, images, films, or music
Listening to web radio or watching web television
Telephoning or making video calls over the Internet
Selling goods or services , e.g. eBay
